title: Krisalis Gold Collection (RISC OS); includes StrongARM patches
description:
+----------------------------------------------------------------------+
        |                                                                      |
        |   Supplied......:  Acorn Antiques    Release name..:  Krisalis.rar   |
        |   Repackaged....:  filth             Release type..:  Games          |

        |                                                                      |
        |   ================================================================   |
        |                            Description                               |
        |   ================================================================   |
        |                                                                      |
        |   A collection of games released by Krisalis. Some are complete      |
        |   titles with manuals, many are 'just' patches to allow older        |
        |   titles to run on the RiscPC. Many thanks to Mouseboi2 for this.    |
        |                                                                      |
        |   Full games                                                         |
        |   ----------                                                         |
        |    - Boxing Manager                                                  |
        |    - Cannon Fodder                                                   |
        |    - Gods                                                            |
        |    - James Pond                                                      |
        |    - Mad Professor Moriati                                           |
        |    - Nebulous                                                        |
        |    - PacMania                                                        |
        |    - Revalation                                                      |
        |    - Speedball 2                                                     |
        |    - Swiv                                                            |
        |    - Terramex                                                        |
        |    - Premier Manager                                                 |
        |    - Zool                                                            |
        |                                                                      |
        |   StrongARM and ARM6/7 patches for games                             |
        |   --------------------------------------                             |
        |    - Alone in the Dark                                               |
        |    - BattleChess                                                     |
        |    - Omar Shariffs Bridge                                            |
        |    - Chuck Rock                                                      |
        |    - Heimdall                                                        |
        |    - HeroQuest                                                       |
        |    - Lemmings                                                        |
        |    - Lemmings 2 The Tribes                                           |
        |    - Lotus 2                                                         |
        |    - Pipemania                                                       |
        |    - Populous                                                        |
        |    - QFG                                                             |
        |    - Simcity                                                         |
        |    - Simcity 2000                                                    |
        |    - Jamgir Khans Squash                                             |
        |    - World Championship Leaderboard                                  |
        |                                                                      |
